name: Under Attack
description:
Under Attack

Your camp is under attack! Defend yourself from the enemy forces and destroy their camp in order to survive! Go now!

Controls:

Simply drag in items from the inventory on the right onto the playing field using your mouse.

Gameplay:

Place turrets on the playing field by dragging them in from the inventory on the right.

Turrets can only shoot a short distance (they aren't the best turrets), so be careful about where you place them!

Keep an eye on your gold. It depletes fast if you aren't careful.

You lose points if you take damage. You gain points if your enemy takes damage. You also get some gold if you destroy a turret or the enemy base camp.

Use the repair tool to repair damaged turrets and the shield tool to give a turret some extra defense.

Alternative Platforms:

A Windows build can be found here. Just extract the .zip file and run the .exe file.

Attribution:

I am not an artist.
The amazing art and sound effects you're probably getting impressed by is the result of the hard work of various artists and has been collected from the Unity Asset Store and modified slightly to better fit the theme of the game. Fonts were provided by Google Fonts.

A detailed list of external assets used in the game can be found here.

This game was created for BrainJam March 2021, hosted by Brain Station 23.
